description: This file defines the React component 'NotesList', which renders a list of notes with search functionality, selection highlighting, and conditional empty or no results states.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes = [], selectedId = null, onSelect, searchable = true, searchQuery = '', onSearch, onClearSearch, emptyMessage = 'No notes yet. Create a new note to get started.', notFoundMessage = 'No notes match your search.', ariaLabel = 'Notes list', })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a list of notes, with optional search, selection, and empty states.
